        Mopheth Nigeria Limited is an organization charged with the goal of meeting the diverse needs of its growing customers from all walks of life. We began as a community Pharmacy in the year 1997, and through the years we have maintained our standard of being a renowned name in the Pharmaceutical industry in Nigeria. However, with respect to our vision consumables, cosmetics and skincare products, safe water production, grocery essentials, and a variety of baked goods. In addition, our 24 hours availability onsite and online in all our branches have equally ensured our clients can rely on us for immediate service at any hour of the day.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist
     

            
    



Job Locations: Victoria Island and Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Take charge of pharmaceutical care and lead with expertise.
	As a Pharmacist, you'll be the trusted advisor for medication safety, patient counselling, and clinical decisions that impact lives daily.


Requirements


	B.Pharm or PharmD degree
	Minimum 1-3 years of experience
	Valid PCN license
	Excellent knowledge of pharmacology and drug interactions
	Strong leadership and organisational skills.


Salary
N200,000  - N300,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrmopheth@gmail.com using "Pharmacist Application" as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Officer (Hybrid)",
  "description": "Pack &#39;N&#39; Pay is a product of CIC Integrated Services LTD. CIC was created as a wholesale store that supplies food to offshore catering companies to feed the offshore workers. Pack &rsquo;N&rsquo; Pay was created as a product that would leverage technology to solve the problems of retailers and wholesalers. Pack &lsquo;N&rsquo; Pay officially started operations on January 18th 2021 and launched her e-commerce website on March 1st 2021.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer (Hybrid)

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers&nbsp;(Hybrid &ndash; On-site &amp; Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Pack&rsquo;N&rsquo;Pay is looking for a Social Media Officer who is passionate about storytelling, online engagement, and brand building.
	This role involves creating, scheduling, and managing engaging content&nbsp;&nbsp;for Pack&rsquo;N&rsquo;Pay&rsquo;s social media platforms to boost brand awareness, customer interaction, and digital&nbsp;&nbsp;growth. You will work both remotely and on-site as needed.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation &amp; Management:


	Develop creative and relevant content for Facebook, Instagram, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, and TikTok.
	Schedule and publish posts to maintain consistent brand visibility.
	Create short videos, graphics, and written posts tailored to different audiences.


Engagement &amp; Community Building:


	Respond promptly to comments, messages, and inquiries on social platforms.
	Foster a loyal online community through active engagement.
	Collaborate with customer service to address online complaints or feedback.


Analytics &amp; Growth:


	Monitor and report social media performance metrics weekly/monthly.
	Track trends, hashtags, and viral opportunities to boost reach.
	Suggest and implement strategies to grow followers and engagement rates.


Collaboration:


	Work closely with the marketing and digital teams to align campaigns.
	Support offline events with live social media coverage.


Requirements


	OND, HND, or B.Sc. in Mass Communication, Marketing, or related field.
	2 - 4 years of proven experience managing social media accounts for a brand.
	Proficiency in Canva, CapCut, or similar content creation tools.
	Strong writing and visual storytelling skills.
	Up-to-date knowledge of social media trends and algorithms.
	Ability to work both remotely and on-site.


Key Attributes:


	Creative and trend-savvy
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills
	Highly responsive and adaptable
	Organised with attention to detail


What We Offer


	Competitive salary
	Hybrid work flexibility
	Opportunity to grow with a dynamic retail and e-commerce brand
	Supportive and youthful work culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and sample work/links to: hr@packnpay.com.ng&nbsp;using &ldquo;Application &ndash; Social Media Officer&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",

Social Media Officer (Hybrid) Job at Pack 'N' Pay




        
    

        
        Pack 'N' Pay is a product of CIC Integrated Services LTD. CIC was created as a wholesale store that supplies food to offshore catering companies to feed the offshore workers. Pack ’N’ Pay was created as a product that would leverage technology to solve the problems of retailers and wholesalers. Pack ‘N’ Pay officially started operations on January 18th 2021 and launched her e-commerce website on March 1st 2021.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer (Hybrid)

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers (Hybrid – On-site & Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Pack’N’Pay is looking for a Social Media Officer who is passionate about storytelling, online engagement, and brand building.
	This role involves creating, scheduling, and managing engaging content  for Pack’N’Pay’s social media platforms to boost brand awareness, customer interaction, and digital  growth. You will work both remotely and on-site as needed.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation & Management:


	Develop creative and relevant content for Facebook, Instagram, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, and TikTok.
	Schedule and publish posts to maintain consistent brand visibility.
	Create short videos, graphics, and written posts tailored to different audiences.


Engagement & Community Building:


	Respond promptly to comments, messages, and inquiries on social platforms.
	Foster a loyal online community through active engagement.
	Collaborate with customer service to address online complaints or feedback.


Analytics & Growth:


	Monitor and report social media performance metrics weekly/monthly.
	Track trends, hashtags, and viral opportunities to boost reach.
	Suggest and implement strategies to grow followers and engagement rates.


Collaboration:


	Work closely with the marketing and digital teams to align campaigns.
	Support offline events with live social media coverage.


Requirements


	OND, HND, or B.Sc. in Mass Communication, Marketing, or related field.
	2 - 4 years of proven experience managing social media accounts for a brand.
	Proficiency in Canva, CapCut, or similar content creation tools.
	Strong writing and visual storytelling skills.
	Up-to-date knowledge of social media trends and algorithms.
	Ability to work both remotely and on-site.


Key Attributes:


	Creative and trend-savvy
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills
	Highly responsive and adaptable
	Organised with attention to detail


What We Offer


	Competitive salary
	Hybrid work flexibility
	Opportunity to grow with a dynamic retail and e-commerce brand
	Supportive and youthful work culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and sample work/links to: hr@packnpay.com.ng using “Application – Social Media Officer” as the subject of the mail.
